template_variables.description: A map of template variables to their values. The key is the variable name and the value is the text value.

multiline_text_variables.description:
A map of multiline text variables to their values. The key is the variable name and the value is the text value.
Must be present when the template contains multiline text variables.

allow_empty_template_variables.description: If true, the template will be rendered even if there are missing variables. Default is false.
